PERSONA:
jamie is a 53-year-old widowed white non-hispanic individual who identifies as gender non-binary. they reside in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. jamie has a high school education and earns a middle-income salary between $30,000 and $40,000 annually.

despite not being affiliated with any particular religion, jamie holds very liberal political views and is a registered democrat voter. they are an avid internet user, accessing it multiple times daily, but do not engage in any volunteer work.

jamie embraces their identity and finds solace in the supportive metropolitan community they call home. while navigating the challenges of widowhood, they remain resilient and committed to living authentically. jamie values education and strives to create a more inclusive society that celebrates diversity and promotes equal opportunities for all.
